lines.text: [Trixie comes upon one of her girls, a blonde, looking through her purse for her gin flask]
You'd forget your rosy cheeks if they weren't slapped on with a paintbrush!
I know I had it when I was with that traveling man last night.
Well, did you look in the First National?
[Blonde lifts up her skirt to check one of her garters. It is not there]
Well, try the other branch, ya simp.
Heaven help a sailor on a night like this.
I thought you said you'd sworn off on sailors.
Well, a girl's gotta have some practice. Some of those sailors are pretty good. At practice.
You can't make a silk purse out of a horse's... neck.
